name: _project(fix);
description:
Jojo's game is broken! Help him by entering a platformer and fixing the code... be careful, if you get the wrong code, you could break the game even more! This is NOT ONLY for programmers. More fun, if you don't have coding skills ;) Only playable on keyboard.

Jam Site: 
POLE 3D

Jam Year: 
2020

Platforms: 
MS Windows, Mac OS X, Linux / Unix, Web standard (HTML5, Java, JavaScript, Flash)

Tools And Technologies: 
Unity (any product)

Credits: 

Gregoire Castelain - Game Designer / Level Designer

Thibaud Colin - Animator / Environment artist

Vincent Dziurla - Programmor

Sophie Maleval -  UI Designer
